articles.title: Coronavirus: COVID-19 vaccine side-effects vs. the risk of infection - Times of India
articles.description: While vaccines do not prevent COVID-19 completely, getting the jab outweighs the many feared risks that exist with catching the infection. Here's how
articles.content:
While most vaccination side-effects tend to be on the milder side, some people can experience unusual, serious reactions, including anaphylaxis, which has also been linked to some deaths.

articles.title: Tripura sent 151 samples for Covid-19 testing. More than half found positive for Delta plus - Hindustan Times
articles.description: As many as 90 samples of the total 151 that Chhattisgarh sent for genome sequencing turned out positive for the Delta plus variant of the SARS-CoV-2 coronavirus, which scientists say may drive a potential third wave of the Covid-19 pandemic in India. | Latest…
articles.content: Tripura confirmed on Friday that more than half of the samples that the state sent for genome sequencing to West Bengal have, in fact, turned out to be positive for the Delta plus variant of the SARS… [+2370 chars]
